```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
SciViews::R
```

```{r}
biometry_h <-read_csv("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQoVtSWbENWzxbALxD0qyNDqxV4uSYqzLCtJgcNGE7ciT6nkWOjA9b6dMBHaSUY8Nw5f-mSpUEeN-3S/pub?output=csv", locale = locale(decimal_mark = ","))
```

```{r}
biometry_h %>.%
  filter(., genre !="NA") -> except_NA
```

```{r}
visdat::vis_dat(except_NA)
```

```{r}
except_NA$alcool <- as.numeric(except_NA$alcool)
```

```{r}
except_NA$acti_physique <- as.numeric(except_NA$acti_physique)
```

```{r}
except_NA$fastfood <- as.numeric(except_NA$fastfood)
```

```{r}
except_NA$grignotage <- as.numeric(except_NA$grignotage)
```

```{r}
except_NA$genre <- as.factor(except_NA$genre)
```



```{r, taille_masse}
chart(except_NA, masse ~ taille | genre )+
geom_point(na.rm=TRUE)
```

```{r}
chart(except_NA, masse ~ alcool | genre )+
geom_point(na.rm=TRUE)
```

```{r}
chart(except_NA, ~ alcool %fill=% acti_profession) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 50) 
```
